source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: One stroke painting for beginners and intermediate level.
items.headline: One stroke painting with acrylic paint.
objectives_summary: One stroke painting
Acrylic painting of flowers

items.headline: Easy to learn magic. Magic tricks with any object. Instant magician
objectives_summary: magic tricks
close up magic
magic tutorials

items.title: Touch the Sky Acrylic Painting Lesson
items.headline: a step by step acrylic lesson!
objectives_summary: how to make a colorful and bright acrylic painting

items.title: The NFT Course
items.headline: Sell Your Digital Art Online
objectives_summary: How to create and sell your NFT / Non-Fungible Token / Digital Art

items.title: Russian Mandalas - Folk Art Acrylic Painting for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Russian Folk Art Artist and Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Irina
visible_instructors.title: Irina De Vicente

items.headline: Traditional Russian Painting Style "Khokhloma"
objectives_summary: We are going to paint together step-by-step a marvelous Khokhloma composition, a real artwork.
You will learn the basic elements of Khokhloma painting that create also a basis for painting in many other Russian Folk styles.
You will get knowledge about the history of Khokhloma style, how people did it centuries ago, which materials they used.

items.title: Learn to paint Natural Sceneries using Watercolors
items.headline: Be happy and stress-free by painting the wonderful sceneries included in this course!!
objectives_summary: Students will learn -  different techniques of water color painting by painting ten different projects on natural sceneries, about color wheel, color theory, etc...

Water color painting of Natural sceneries like open sky with birds flying, sun-rise, sun-set, river with rocks, tree in the nature, reflection on water, mountain side, moon in the sky, galaxy , solar system, etc....
Water color painting

items.title: The Ultimate Course of Handmade Ankara Bags
items.headline: Step by step training
objectives_summary: How to access common crafting tools.
How to identify/source for crafting materials.
Sketching out Ankara bag designs.

items.title: House and Building Portraits: Line and Wash Essentials
items.headline: Learn how to draw and paint a portrait of any building. Included: 6 full demonstrations with narrated instructions.
objectives_summary: How to paint a portrait of a building. Learn how to draw and paint any building from a reference photo or plein air.
How to draw simple to complex buildings with a pen, and how to use watercolor to imply light, shade and mood with a variety of colors.
Learn how to hold your pen for different effects, draw basic lines and shapes, how to create depth and light/darkness in your drawing.

items.title: Oil Painting Portrait Course - Beautiful Women & The Man
items.headline: In this course you will learn a simple and effective method to create 2 Big oil portrait painting.
objectives_summary: A process and structure to creating 2 face painting from start to finish, Easy for anyone to manage.
How painting in layers works starting  and you’ll learn how to bring an oil painting.
You’ll learn how to use  color that will make mixing any color imaginable easy.

items.title: How to make a Circle Skirt for Kids
items.headline: Learn how to make a circle skirt for Kids
objectives_summary: How to quickly and easily DIY a circle skirt.

items.title: Wicked Witch & Spider Acrylic Painting Class
items.headline: Step-by-Step Halloween Acrylic Painting Tutorial for Beginners
objectives_summary: Color Mixing Basics
Basic Equipment Used for Acrylic Painting
Proper Brush Handling

items.title: Therapeutic Zentangle® Art on Black Tile

visible_instructors.name: Celine
visible_instructors.title: Celine Ong
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Zentangle Teacher, Artist, Therapeutic Art Coach

items.headline: Step-by-Step De-stress Learning: Mastering the Zen Drawing Techniques for 3 Different Shapes of Black Paper Tiles
objectives_summary: Zentangle® art techniques on black paper tiles
Create meditative art on 3 different shapes of paper
Deep focus learning the 3 Zentangle patterns

items.title: Watercolor lesson - Sunset at lake - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will learn how to paint&use watercolor techniques easily with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint watercolor landscape: how to plan layers for it, which parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn watercolor painting techniques: wet-in-wet, layering, glazing, detailing, watercolor lifting
Learn watercolor painting basics: air perspective, values, color mixing, lifting pigments, issue fixing

items.title: Improve the techniques of Beeswax crayon drawing for Adults
items.headline: Beeswax crayon drawing course for teachers and parents to improve skills
objectives_summary: COURSE FOR ADULTS TO IMPROVE SKILLS IN BEESWAX CRAYON DRAWING

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Poppy fields - Landscape

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Poppy fields Landscape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, dry brush, shaped brushes using
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: "Stars and Stripes" Pattern Quilt Top: From Start to Finish
items.headline: Learn to quilt by making a fun, patriotic or night sky themed quilt top!
objectives_summary: You will finish this course having made an entire heirloom quilt top.
Quilting is easy and straightforward if you follow the simple steps.
Tips and Tricks that you won’t get anywhere else!
